Lists Implemented R6 Distributions

Source: R/listDistributions.R
listDistributions.Rd

Lists R6 distributions, either all in a data.table or filtered by chosen traits and/or properties.

listDistributions(simplify = FALSE, traits = NULL, view = FALSE)

Arguments

simplify

logical.
traits

list of traits to filter distributions by.
view

logical, if TRUE displays Distributions in Viewer. Ignored if simplify is FALSE.

Examples

listDistributions()
#>     ShortName        ClassName Type ValueSupport  VariateForm    Package
#>  1:       Arc          Arcsine    ℝ   continuous   univariate     distr6
#>  2:      Bern        Bernoulli   ℤ+     discrete   univariate     distr6
#>  3:      Beta             Beta   ℝ+   continuous   univariate      stats
#>  4:     Binom         Binomial   ℤ+     discrete   univariate      stats
#>  5:    Cauchy           Cauchy    ℝ   continuous   univariate      stats
#>  6:     ChiSq       ChiSquared   ℝ+   continuous   univariate      stats
#>  7:     Degen       Degenerate    ℝ   continuous   univariate     distr6
#>  8:     DUnif  DiscreteUniform    ℤ     discrete   univariate     distr6
#>  9:       Exp      Exponential   ℝ+   continuous   univariate      stats
#> 10:         F    FDistribution   ℝ+   continuous   univariate      stats
#> 11:     Gamma            Gamma   ℝ+   continuous   univariate      stats
#> 12:      Geom        Geometric   ℤ+     discrete   univariate      stats
#> 13:      Gomp         Gompertz   ℝ+   continuous   univariate     distr6
#> 14:       Lap          Laplace    ℝ   continuous   univariate     distr6
#> 15:       Log      Logarithmic   ℤ+     discrete   univariate extraDistr
#> 16:     Logis         Logistic    ℝ   continuous   univariate      stats
#> 17:  Multinom      Multinomial ℤ+^K     discrete multivariate      stats
#> 18:    NBinom NegativeBinomial   ℤ+     discrete   univariate     distr6
#> 19:      Norm           Normal    ℝ   continuous   univariate      stats
#> 20:      Pare           Pareto   ℝ+   continuous   univariate     distr6
#> 21:      Pois          Poisson   ℤ+     discrete   univariate      stats
#> 22:         T         StudentT    ℝ   continuous   univariate      stats
#> 23:       Tri       Triangular    ℝ   continuous   univariate     distr6
#> 24:      Unif          Uniform    ℝ   continuous   univariate      stats
#> 25:   Weibull          Weibull   ℝ+   continuous   univariate      stats
#>     ShortName        ClassName Type ValueSupport  VariateForm    Package
listDistributions(traits = list(VariateForm = "univariate"))
#>     ShortName        ClassName Type ValueSupport VariateForm    Package
#>  1:       Arc          Arcsine    ℝ   continuous  univariate     distr6
#>  2:      Bern        Bernoulli   ℤ+     discrete  univariate     distr6
#>  3:      Beta             Beta   ℝ+   continuous  univariate      stats
#>  4:     Binom         Binomial   ℤ+     discrete  univariate      stats
#>  5:    Cauchy           Cauchy    ℝ   continuous  univariate      stats
#>  6:     ChiSq       ChiSquared   ℝ+   continuous  univariate      stats
#>  7:     Degen       Degenerate    ℝ   continuous  univariate     distr6
#>  8:     DUnif  DiscreteUniform    ℤ     discrete  univariate     distr6
#>  9:       Exp      Exponential   ℝ+   continuous  univariate      stats
#> 10:         F    FDistribution   ℝ+   continuous  univariate      stats
#> 11:     Gamma            Gamma   ℝ+   continuous  univariate      stats
#> 12:      Geom        Geometric   ℤ+     discrete  univariate      stats
#> 13:      Gomp         Gompertz   ℝ+   continuous  univariate     distr6
#> 14:       Lap          Laplace    ℝ   continuous  univariate     distr6
#> 15:       Log      Logarithmic   ℤ+     discrete  univariate extraDistr
#> 16:     Logis         Logistic    ℝ   continuous  univariate      stats
#> 17:    NBinom NegativeBinomial   ℤ+     discrete  univariate     distr6
#> 18:      Norm           Normal    ℝ   continuous  univariate      stats
#> 19:      Pare           Pareto   ℝ+   continuous  univariate     distr6
#> 20:      Pois          Poisson   ℤ+     discrete  univariate      stats
#> 21:         T         StudentT    ℝ   continuous  univariate      stats
#> 22:       Tri       Triangular    ℝ   continuous  univariate     distr6
#> 23:      Unif          Uniform    ℝ   continuous  univariate      stats
#> 24:   Weibull          Weibull   ℝ+   continuous  univariate      stats
#>     ShortName        ClassName Type ValueSupport VariateForm    Package
listDistributions(traits = list(ValueSupport = "discrete"))
#>    ShortName        ClassName Type ValueSupport  VariateForm    Package
#> 1:      Bern        Bernoulli   ℤ+     discrete   univariate     distr6
#> 2:     Binom         Binomial   ℤ+     discrete   univariate      stats
#> 3:     DUnif  DiscreteUniform    ℤ     discrete   univariate     distr6
#> 4:      Geom        Geometric   ℤ+     discrete   univariate      stats
#> 5:       Log      Logarithmic   ℤ+     discrete   univariate extraDistr
#> 6:  Multinom      Multinomial ℤ+^K     discrete multivariate      stats
#> 7:    NBinom NegativeBinomial   ℤ+     discrete   univariate     distr6
#> 8:      Pois          Poisson   ℤ+     discrete   univariate      stats
